message.content:
Here is the detailed breakdown of the information from the form along with the JSON output file representation:

### Text Breakdown

**Header:**
- **Document Type**: Executive Document Summary Form
- **Association**: Indiana Department of Transportation - Local Public Agency
- **Title**: Project Coordination Contract
- **EDS #**: A249-21-L200160
- **Des. No.**: 1902819
- **CFDA No.**: 20.205
- **Document Version**: Version 7/1/2020

**Contract Description:**
- This contract is made effective as of the date of the Indiana Attorney General signature affixed. 
- Parties involved: State of Indiana (acting through the Indiana Department of Transportation, referred to as INDOT) and Lake County (referred to as LPA).

**Notice to Parties:**
- Whenever any notice, statement, or other communication is required under this contract, it shall be sent to the following addresses unless otherwise advised:
  - **A. Notices to INDOT (regarding contract provisions):** 
    - Office of LPA and Grant Administration
    - Attention: Director of LPA and Grant Administration
    - Address: 100 North Senate Avenue, Room N955-LPA, Indianapolis, Indiana 46204
    - Copy to:
      - Chief Legal Counsel and Deputy Commissioner
      - Indiana Department of Transportation
      - Address: 100 North Senate Avenue, Room N758, Indianapolis, Indiana 46204
  - **B. Notices to INDOT (regarding project management):** 
    - Address to: INDOT LaPorte District
    - Address: 315 East Boyd Boulevard, LaPorte, Indiana 46350
  - **C. Notices to LPA:** 
    - Address to: Lake County Highway Department
    - Address: 1100 East Monitor Street, Crown Point, Indiana 46307

### JSON Representation

```json
{
  "document_type": "Executive Document Summary Form",
  "association": "Indiana Department of Transportation - Local Public Agency",
  "title": "Project Coordination Contract",
  "eds_number": "A249-21-L200160",
  "des_number": "1902819",
  "cfda_number": "20.205",
  "document_version": "Version 7/1/2020",
  "contract_description": {
    "effective_date": "Date of Indiana Attorney General signature",
    "parties": [
      {
        "name": "State of Indiana",
        "acting_through": "Indiana Department of Transportation",
        "referred_as": "INDOT"
      },
      {
        "name": "Lake County",
        "description": "local public agency in the State of Indiana",
        "referred_as": "LPA"
      }
    ]
  },
  "notice_to_parties": {
    "notices_to_INDOR": {
      "regarding_contract_provisions": {
        "office": "Office of LPA and Grant Administration",
        "attention": "Director of LPA and Grant Administration",
        "address": "100 North Senate Avenue, Room N955-LPA, Indianapolis, Indiana 46204",
        "copy_to": {
          "office": "Chief Legal Counsel and Deputy Commissioner",
          "department": "Indiana Department of Transportation",
          "address": "100 North Senate Avenue, Room N758, Indianapolis, Indiana 46204"
        }
      },
      "regarding_project_management": {
        "office": "INDOT LaPorte District",
        "address": "315 East Boyd Boulevard, LaPorte, Indiana 46350"
      }
    },
    "notices_to_LPA": {
      "office": "Lake County Highway Department",
      "address": "1100 East Monitor Street, Crown Point, Indiana 46307"
    }
  }
}
```

This JSON file captures all the essential details contained in the form and can be used for further data processing or record keeping.
